text:
GRAIL | Quality Engineer, DEVOPS, Software Engineer, Security Engineer, Technical Writer, Product Manager | Menlo Park, CA | Onsite

GRAIL is a life sciences company whose mission is to detect cancer early when it can be cured. GRAIL is using the power of high-intensity sequencing, population-scale clinical trials, and state of the art software engineering and data science to enhance the scientific understanding of cancer biology and develop blood tests for early-stage cancer detection. We are seeking passionate and talented individuals to join us in realizing our mission, which has the potential to dramatically reduce the global burden of cancer.

https://grail.com/careers/career-listings/?department=Comput...
